Introduction

Lee Sung Min is known as the Lead Vocalist and Lead Dancer of the boy group Super Junior under SM Entertainment. Aside from singing, Sungmin also performs at Musicals.

His military service began on March 31, 2015, and ended on December 30, 2016.

He is also happily married to musical actress Kim Sa Eun.
